Package frogger.util

Class ScoreboardWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.util.ScoreboardWriter
  • public class ScoreboardWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The ScoreboardWriter is a utility to write the player info to a scoreboard file.
